Changes.change_log: Added French translation for `Searching...` in the Select2 JS autocomplete module.

Features.change_log: Added capability to add and override strings in the CKAN i18n API.
New CLI command `export-pd-reporting-info` exports data publisher info for Proactive Disclosures into a CSV.

Changes.change_log: Added `--dataset-id` (`-D`) and `--ignore-hashes` (`-i`) options to the `portal_update` command. This is an interim fix to some DataStore tables not syncing to the Portal during the Post to Portal process.
Further improved error handling and message outputs when processing uploaded Excel files.
